exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall i u v u' v' : V, R (cons u' i) (cons i u) -> R (cons v' i) (cons i v) -> R (cons u v) (cons v' u') H0 : forall u : V, exists v : V, orthogonal v u u, v, u', v' : V Hcol : colineaire u u' Hu_ortho : orthogonal u v Hu'_ortho : orthogonal u' v' Hsym_ortho : orthogonal v u v_orto : V Hv_orto : orthogonal v_orto u v'_orto : PO Unable to unify "orthogonal u v" with "colineaire v v'".

original: intros u v u' v' Hcol Hu_ortho Hu'_ortho. assert (Hsym_ortho: orthogonal v u). apply orthogonal_sym. auto. destruct (construction_orthogonal u) as [v_orto Hv_orto]. assert (Hsym: orthogonal v_orto u). apply orthogonal_sym. auto. apply construction_orthogonal in Hw. destruct Hw as [v'_orto Hv'_orto]. assert (Hpiv: R (cons u u') (cons v_w v'_orto)). apply reflexion with (i := u). - apply Hu_ortho. - auto. apply vR_R_compatible with (u := v) (v' := v'_orto) (u' := v) (v' := v'). - apply v_refl. - symmetry. apply Hv'_orto. apply rotation in Hpiv. apply vR_R_compatible with (u := v) (v' := v'_orto) (u' := v_w) (v' := v_w). - apply v_refl. - auto. apply angle_nul.
